articles.author: Elon Musk
articles.description:
Re @jordanbpeterson Compared to AI, progress with Neuralink will be slow and easy to assess, as there is large regulatory apparatus approving medical devices.
There is no regulatory oversight of AI, which is a *major* problem. I‚Äôve been calling for AI safety regulation for over a decade!

articles.author: Elon Musk
articles.description:
Re @araghougassian @Spooks The problem is that likes are public, subjecting people to criticism, and ‚Äúlike‚Äù is often the wrong description, as you often just think something is interesting or notable, but not likable. 
We need to add these critical distinctions.
